**FAQ**

**How long does it take to deliver the VPS?**

All our VPS are delivered within 24 hours, as they are manually delivered, all of them go through a review
to avoid fraud spam requests. However we can delay up 72 hours if it exists some additional issue.

**Can i reinstall my vps?**

Yes, you can do it, you have absolute control from your VPS

**Do you offer refunds?**

Yes, We offer refunds until the third day of delivered your VPS, if you are not happy with the service 
open a ticket support.

**Are your prices guaranteed?**

We guarantee our prices while you have a contract with us, however if your contract finish soon we can increase the price or not renovate your services

**How do you manage the spam?**

We do not allow spam on our services, any spam attempt will be notified and your service will be cancelled and discontinued with out any claim or returns and refunds.

**Disclaimer:**

If you start a paypal dispute or in any payment method that you choose, with out talk to us firts, your account will be deleted from our system and we start all the process to recover the ammount that you have disputed
